detail_desc: Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Flat cap in a woven wool blend. Cotton lining.
Thin metal chain necklace with letter pendants decorated with pearly plastic beads. Adjustable length 44-51.5 cm.
Dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, pleats at the front, long, cuffed sleeves and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, wide shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Light support.
Belt in imitation leather with a round metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Slightly wider-fitting jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere. Dropped shoulders with raw-edge seams, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft linen jersey with a V-neck and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Fine-knit jumper in a cotton blend. Long sleeves with a flared flounce at the cuffs and narrow ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Blanket in soft, pattern-knit organic cotton with ribbed edges. Size 80x100 cm.

Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with covered elastication, a button and concealed drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a zip fly, and back and leg pockets with a button. Loose fit with tapered legs and covered elastication at the hems.
Fitted nursing dress in cotton-blend jersey with short sleeves and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Top in a crêpe weave with a scalloped V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined.
Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with embroidered sections, a V-neck, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist. Lined skirt.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with an opening at the top and small stand-up collar with ties at the front. Long raglan sleeves, narrow cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Joggers in airy cotton poplin. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, zip fly, side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
A-line dress in a viscose weave with a round neck and concealed buttons down the front. Long balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and elasticated cuffs. Unlined.

Wide blouse in a cotton weave with embroidery, a small, embroidered, stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, wide balloon sleeves with embroidery and buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Fine-knit dress with sequined embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Body in soft lace with a straight cut at the top, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps and a string back.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Polo-neck jumper knitted in a cashmere blend with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with asymmetric cuffs
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar and heart-shaped press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.

Waist bag in cotton canvas with a text print on the front and a double-ended zip at the top with canvas tabs. Zipped compartment at the back, one inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Height 15.5 cm. Width 26.6 cm. Depth 5 cm.

Jacket in woven fabric with a small print motif at the top. Detachable, jersey-lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved faux fur top.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Fancy dress gloves in glitter-print jersey with elasticated cuffs and a faux fur trim at the top.

Oversized, calf-length dungaree dress in cotton twill. Relaxed, straight style with straps that fasten at the front with a button, an open chest pocket, large patch front pockets, a back pocket and a loop at one side. Unlined.
Elastic bracelets in various designs.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at one side, and a raw-edge hem.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, lightly crêped satin with a boat neck and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and a flared, pleated skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Sleeveless satin top with a jersey back and lace-covered V-neck front and back.
Non-wired bra in lace with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cap with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, fitted dress in a slightly stretchy weave with a V-neck, zip in one side and long, flared sleeves with inset lace sections and lace-trimmed cuffs. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter approx. 4.5 cm.

Short, A-line dress in mesh with flock-print spots. Round neck, a V-shaped opening with ties at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Gathered seam under the bust and at the hips for added width. Sleeveless jersey inner dress.
Set with 20 narrow hair elastics and 6 metal hair clips. Length of hair clips 4 cm.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a patch pocket at the back.
Straight-cut dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Wide jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a textured weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, and pockets in the side seams.

Fully lined swimsuit with shaped, padded cups, a wrapover top, seam under the bust and low-cut back. Gathers in the side seams for best fit. The swimsuit is made partly from recycled polyester and polyamide.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a smocked stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Laptop sleeve with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 2x26x34 cm. Fits laptops up to 13".
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and cut-off fringing on the sleeves and hem. Rounded hem.
Soft cap in UV-protective fabric with a peak at the front and flap at the back to protect both the face and back of the neck. UPF 50.
Fitted jacket in a linen and viscose weave with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in marled sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif on the front and a lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with an appliqué at the top.
Handkerchief in patterned mulberry silk. Size 33x33 cm.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top and skirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Top with 3/4-length sleeves. Short, bell-shaped skirt with smocking at the waist.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Imitation suede loafers with imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Imitation suede sandals with covered block heels, fringed straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in an airy organic cotton weave with lace embroidery. Deep V-neck with a wide flounced trim, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Shirt in patterned premium cotton with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
